subproject.description: The project will focus in three main areas: Support participation of vulnerable communities in local decision-making - through identification of priorities and preparation of Community Development Plans; implementation of community upgrading projects in partnership with local governments, strengthening capacities and cooperation between Roma and Egyptian NGOs and their respective communities;  enable vulnerable communities to access their rights, particularly access to public services– through civil registration; community policing and strengthening network of Roma Mediators in areas of health, education, and child protection; facilitating vocational training and employment;  promote  policies and institutional strengthening for social inclusion of vulnerable communities – through – capacity building and assistance to local and central government institutions; capacity building and partnership strengthening for Roma and Egyptian NGOs.
subproject.title: Empowering vulnerable local co

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

title: Empowering vulnerable local communities of Albania
